intro: Sarcoglottis pubilabia, commonly known as the hairy-labied sarcoglottis, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Southeast Asia. Its flowers are typically greenish-yellow, with a short, fleshy spadix surrounded by a white to green spathe. Sarcoglottis pubilabia is often grown as an ornamental plant due to its attractive foliage and unique floral structure.
